mapper.sql: SELECT wwop.work_order_id, wwop.osp_item_id, wwop.osp_item_number, wwop.supplier_id, wwop.supplier_site_id, wwop.supplier_name, wwop.operation_sequence_number, wwop.work_order_operation_id, wwop.standard_operation_code, wwop.operation_type, wwop.operation_name, wwop.work_center_id, (select pwda.work_center_code from pes_work_center_description_all pwda where pwda.work_center_id = wwop.work_center_id) as work_center_code, wwop.pes_work_order_id, wwop.create_date, wwop.create_by, wwop.last_update_date, wwop.last_update_by, wwop.pes_work_order_operation_id, wwpr.requisition_number, wwpr.segment1 FROM pes_wie_work_order_operation_erp wwop left join pes_wie_work_order_operation_erp_pr_v wwpr on (wwop.work_order_operation_id = wwpr.work_order_operation_id)
mapper.select: where wwop.pes_work_order_id = #{pesWorkOrderId} and wwop.work_order_id > 0 and wwop.work_order_operation_id = 0 order by wwop.operation_sequence_number desc

SELECT wwob.pes_work_order_id FROM pes_wie_work_orders_b_erp wwob, pes_wie_work_order_operation_erp wwop WHERE wwob.pes_work_order_id = wwop.pes_work_order_id AND wwob.work_order_id > 0 AND wwob.work_order_status_id = 10005 AND wwop.work_order_operation_id = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pes_wie_work_order_operation_erp ( operation_sequence_number, standard_operation_code, operation_type, operation_name, work_center_id, pes_work_order_id, create_date, create_by, last_update_date, last_update_by, work_order_id, erp_submit_date, osp_item_id, supplier_id, supplier_site_id, osp_item_number, supplier_name, work_order_operation_id) (SELECT #{operationSequenceNumber}, #{standardOperationCode}, #{operationType}, #{operationName}, #{workCenterId}, #{pesWorkOrderId}, #{createDate}, #{createBy}, #{createDate}, #{createBy}, 0, #{createDate}, #{ospItemId}, #{supplierId}, #{supplierSiteId}, #{ospItemNumber}, #{supplierName}, 0)
mapper.update: update pes_wie_work_order_operation_erp set work_order_operation_id = #{workOrderOperationId},last_update_by = #{createBy},last_update_date = #{createDate},erp_submit_date = (case when last_update_date > #{lastUpdateDate} then #{lastUpdateDate} else #{createDate} end) where pes_work_order_operation_id = #{pesWorkOrderOperationId} and pes_work_order_id = #{pesWorkOrderId}; update pes_wie_work_order_operation_resource_erp set work_order_operation_id = #{workOrderOperationId},last_update_by = #{createBy},last_update_date = #{createDate} where pes_work_order_operation_id = #{pesWorkOrderOperationId} and pes_work_order_id = #{pesWorkOrderId}
mapper.insert: insert into pes_wie_work_submit_erp_infor_list (pes_work_order_id,pes_id,erp_id,count_number,item_number,item_description,erp_type,type,erp_flag,remark,create_by,create_date,last_update_by,last_update_date) values ( #{pesWorkOrderId,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{pesWorkOrderOperationId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{workOrderOperationId,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{operationSequenceNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{standardOperationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},(case when #{standardOperationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} = 'CK01' then '仓管员发料过程' when #{standardOperationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} = 'CK02' then '仓库完工入库工序' when #{standardOperationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} = 'WX01' then '外协工序' when #{standardOperationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} = 'WX02' then '委外发料工序' when #{standardOperationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} = 'WX03' then '委外完工工序' when #{standardOperationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} = 'HZDY_01' then '惠州电源加工工序' when #{standardOperationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} = 'INTER_FEE_1' then '内部代加工工序' else null end),#{erpType,jdbcType=INTEGER},1,#{erpFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update pes_wie_work_order_operation_erp set work_order_operation_id = #{workOrderOperationId},erp_submit_date = #{createDate},last_update_by = #{createBy},last_update_date = #{createDate} where pes_work_order_operation_id = #{pesWorkOrderOperationId} and pes_work_order_id = #{pesWorkOrderId}; update pes_wie_wo_operation_materials_erp set work_order_operation_id = #{workOrderOperationId},last_update_by = #{createBy},last_update_date = #{createDate} where pes_work_order_operation_id = #{pesWorkOrderOperationId} and pes_work_order_id = #{pesWorkOrderId}
mapper.select: SELECT wwob.pes_work_order_id, wwob.work_order_type_id, wwob.work_center_id, wwob.organization_id, osp.osp_item_id, osp.supplier_id, osp.supplier_site_id, osp.osp_item_number, osp.supplier_name, isnull(osp.work_center_code,pwd.work_center_code) as work_center_code FROM pes_wie_work_orders_b_erp wwob left join pes_wie_work_orders_ops_item_erp osp on (wwob.inventory_item_id = osp.inventory_item_id and wwob.organization_id = osp.organization_id and wwob.work_center_id = osp.work_center_id and osp.prioryty = 1) LEFT JOIN pes_work_center_description_all pwd ON (wwob.organization_id = pwd.organization_id AND wwob.work_center_id = pwd.work_center_id) where wwob.pes_work_order_id = #{pesWorkOrderId}
where 1=1 and wwop.work_order_id > 0 and wwop.last_update_date > wwop.create_date and wwop.last_update_date > wwop.erp_submit_date and wwop.work_order_operation_id > 0
